title: Matplotlib Hlines and Vlines
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use hlines and vlines functions in Matplotlib. These functions are used to draw horizontal and vertical lines across a plot.

meta.title: Mastering Matplotlib Hlines and Vlines
meta.description: Learn how to use hlines and vlines functions in Matplotlib to draw horizontal and vertical lines across a plot.
meta.keywords: matplotlib, vlines, python, hlines, data visualization
